name: Thermaltake V3 Black AMD Edition System Cabinet

reviews.name: Thermaltake V3 AMD Edition Case
reviews.reviewText: WOW.. i love this case 40 bucks is a steal and it comes with a 120mm back cooling fan and a ton of screws. case is even painted black inside wich is a plus.. trust me buy it its awesome
reviews.title: Awesome case.. seriously just buy it

reviews.name: Thermaltake V3 AMD Edition Case
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to improve airflow after upgrading my graphics card. For the price you cannot beat this case. The only thing keeping my review from 5 stars is the lack of a second cooling fan. However, I found a 120mm secondary fan online for $10 that had a red LED to match the built in rear fan. My computer runs cooler than ever and the case is very stylish.
reviews.title: Good case, very stylish and keeps my computer cool

reviews.name: Thermaltake V3 AMD Edition Case
reviews.reviewText: The case is very well built! It has a really cool design and tons of airflow. Great front such as 2 usb 3.0s which is really useful! Overall 5 out of 5!
reviews.title: Great case for the money!

reviews.name: Thermaltake V3 AMD Edition Case
reviews.reviewText: This is the best case that I have ever used for a build and I have been building computers for almost 20 years. There are a lot of locations to put fans. All the red area at the front of the case is perforated for air flow. I used a clear lighted power supply that looks great. There is a location at the bottom of the case where you can attach a SSD 2.5 inch drive so you don't need an adapter. There is plenty spaces for 3.5 inch and 5.25 inch drives with one screwless adapter for each size. There is a USB 3.0 plug going to the front panel, so you might consider using a motherboard that has a jack for that plug. This case is way more worth what you pay for it. I put an AMD A8 CPU in it since it is branded for an AMD. Very cool looking. Buy it.
reviews.title: The best case that I have ever used for a build.

reviews.name: Thermaltake V3 AMD Edition Case
reviews.reviewText: The power supply filter could be designed better. My motherboard does not have USB-3 so I must get an adapter, why don't they include one. Nit picking any way good case for the money.
reviews.title: This is a good case for the $$$.
